reg_info.act_under: Emergency Management and Civil Protection Act

content.content: 1. The terms of this Order are set out in Schedule 1. SCHEDULE 1   Extensions of orders made under subsection 7.0.2 (4) of the Act
content.raw_html:
1. The terms of this Order are set out in Schedule 1.

SCHEDULE 1
Extensions of orders made under subsection 7.0.2 (4) of the Act

content.content:
1. An Order referred to in Column 1 of the following Table is extended under section 7.0.8 of the Act past its previously applicable revocation date, as set out in Column 2 of the Table opposite the Order, and is revoked on the date set out opposite the Order in Column 3, subject to any further extension under that section. Table Item   Column 1   Order in Council and date made   Column 2   Previously applicable revocation date   Column 3   Current revocation date 

  1.   Revoked: O. Reg. 347/22, s. 1 (1). 

  2.   Revoked: O. Reg. 203/22, s. 1 (1). 

  3.   Order in Council filed as O. Reg. 305/21 (Regulated Health Professionals), made on April 21, 2021   April 20, 2022   April 27, 2022 

  4.   Revoked: O. Reg. 348/22, s. 1 (1).

content.content: 2. The extension of the Order in Council filed as Ontario Regulation 71/22 (Critical Infrastructure and Highways), made by Ontario Regulation 327/22, is shortened such that the Order is revoked on April 15, 2022.
